padding--y-none.title: No vertical padding
padding--y-none.description: Removes all padding from the top and bottom.

padding--y-xs.title: Tiny vertical padding
padding--y-xs.description: Adds a tiny amount of padding to the top and bottom.

padding--y-sm.title: Small vertical padding
padding--y-sm.description: Adds a small amount of padding to the top and bottom.

padding--y-md.title: Medium vertical padding
padding--y-md.description: Adds a medium amount of padding to the top and bottom.

padding--y-lg.title: Large vertical padding
padding--y-lg.description: Adds a large amount of padding to the top and bottom.

padding--y-xl.title: Extra-large vertical padding
padding--y-xl.description: Adds an extra-large amount of padding to the top and bottom.

padding--y-xxl.title: Double-extra-large vertical padding
padding--y-xxl.description: Adds a double-extra-large amount of padding to the top and bottom.
